allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Bingo Card Goal Tracker

Complete implementation of web-based bingo card goal tracker for couples:
- 5x5 bingo grid with free space designation
- Goal completion tracking with dates and notes
- Automatic bingo detection \(rows, columns, diagonals\)
- Confetti animation and sound effects
- Personalization \(themes, stamps, colors\)
- Mobile-responsive design
- SQLite database for persistence
- RESTful API with Express backend

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
